title: Sets: construction and display
creator_credit: Lawrie Lawler and Centre for Educational Television Overseas
brief_description: Studies television studio set design, concentrating on three common production situations: - the presenter set’, theinterview set’, and the `drama set’. Includes details of their design, planning and construction. Emphasises the need for co-ordination with studio engineers. Well presented and easy to understand with good use of models as an instructive tool.
